SAMRAI::tbox::Database::Serializable

Detailed Description

Database::Serializable is an abstract base class for those objects that can serialize/unserialize their data to/from a database.

Some methods in Database require objects to implement this interface. For example, putVector and getVector require that the objects in the vector being serialized implement Database::Serializable.
